Fires of guilt coursing through my veins, into my soul, evoking and awaking memories of pain and doubts of life that was never rich nor full not even worth .... remembering!!! Looking into the blankness unfettered eyes that stare at my every spoonful in raggidy awe, the children of the streets and alleys whose inkling of hope is a piece of bread ... they hunger!!! Now in to the eyes of leaders of politicians and diabtribes who carry the slogan expressing they fight for the peoples' rights what people? whose people? can words assuage hunger? can promises heal ... the children!!! Is this what they call life? is this what they call hope? Is this what they call promises? and while the children of the streets await for the fulfillment they continue to hunger and lose hope only one question remains... unanswered still... WHAT HAVE WE DONE???

Wish it was you to fill my days with laughter to make each evening a night of utter splendor to hold my hand and calm all my fears to greet me each morning with your smiling eyes... Wish it was you to hug me when thunder rolls to reassure me always as lightning streaks the skies you to dry all my tears when things go all wrong as they often do in my dreary life... How i wish it was you to be there with me each time when i need someone to listen to catch me if i fall now i make this wish so you would simply know that all i ever wished for is for me and you...

In the rise of midsummer sun the swallows fly to distant horizons to find nesting places to find home... to find solace... to find warmth... So does my heart yearning for a place to call home for i found it in your eyes... in your smile... in your love... So i pray to all the Gods i know and to Him to always let me see my way to you...

The mornings that pass so swiftly through bringing new hope bringing new tidings of joy and laughter... Life is a constant fight for happiness a struggle to be the very best we are and can ever be... This as we open our eyes to the glory of each new morn open your heart to the challenges to the beauty that life is so short and that we must give it always our BEST...

Here... there... today... tomorrow... whatever, whenever... in anything, love can grow... for love need not time nor place, not incident but hearts that're entwined and a kiss that is meant.... Love need just a chance an acceptance from someone then the hearts can dance to a music heard by none Love simply is a being of its own for love like time flies to all parts of the unknown Here... now... there...tomorrow... where ever love grows... where ever love is...

Like a pillar of stone may crumble to dust and blown or stand solid like granite its due...in time.... Like a flower in full bloom mistify the eyes and capture a soul forever or fade... in time Like life may come to waste that fleets from grasp making neither a ripple mean nothing... in time Like a bird in flight soar to heights unknown or fall to jagged rocks only... in time Love like time fleets away from us unless we hold it tight make it grow... in time
